english.bapz: Branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8)
english.bapzal: Branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8) and store next line number in ra
english.bnaz: Branch to line c if abs(a) > max (b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8)
english.bnazal: Branch to line c if abs(a) > max (b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8) and store next line number in ra
english.brapz: Relative branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8)
english.brnaz: Relative branch to line c if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8)
english.sapz: Register = 1 if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon * 8), otherwise 0
english.snaz: Register = 1 if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon), otherwise 0
english.log: Register = base e log(a) or ln(a)
